creditline: Gift of Mr.and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
description: carved rhinoceros horn libation cup; in form of a magnolia flower; the exterior decorated in carved figures of the 8 Taoist immortals; carved wood base
text: This is a rare figurative cup, showing the Eight Immortals of Chinese mythology. These seven men and one woman, revered by the Taoists, are also a popular element in secular Chinese culture.
title: Libation Cup with Base
